sentences.chinese: 韓之先與周同姓，姓姬氏。
sentences.literal: The Han ancestors shared the same surname as the Zhou royal house, the Ji clan.

sentences.chinese: 其後苗裔事晉，得封於韓原，曰韓武子。
sentences.literal: Later descendants served Jin, obtained enfeoffment at Han Yuan, and were called Han Wu Zi.

sentences.chinese: 武子後三世有韓厥，從封姓為韓氏。
sentences.literal: Three generations after Wu Zi there was Han Jue, who from his enfeoffment took the surname Han clan.

sentences.chinese: 韓厥，晉景公之三年，晉司寇屠岸賈將作亂，誅靈公之賊趙盾。
sentences.literal: Han Jue, in Jin Jing Gong's third year, the Jin Si Kou Tu An Jia was about to rebel and execute Ling Gong's traitor Zhao Dun.

sentences.chinese: 趙盾已死矣，欲誅其子趙朔。
sentences.literal: Zhao Dun was already dead, and they desired to execute his son Zhao Shuo.
Han Jue tried to stop Jia, but Jia would not listen.
Jue told Zhao Shuo to flee.

sentences.chinese: 及賈誅趙氏，厥稱疾不出。
sentences.literal: When Jia executed the Zhao clan, Jue claimed illness and did not go out.

sentences.chinese: 程嬰、公孫杵臼之藏趙孤趙武也，厥知之。
sentences.literal: Cheng Ying and Gong Sun Chu Jiu hid the Zhao orphan Zhao Wu, and Jue knew it.

sentences.chinese: 景公十一年，厥與郤克將兵八百乘伐齊，敗齊頃公于鞍，獲逢丑父。
sentences.literal: In Jing Gong's eleventh year, Jue and Xi Ke led eight hundred chariots to attack Qi, defeated Qi Qing Gong at An, and captured Feng Chou Fu.

sentences.chinese: 於是晉作六卿，而韓厥在一卿之位，號為獻子。
sentences.literal: Thus Jin established the six ministers, and Han Jue held one of the ministerial positions, called Xian Zi.

sentences.chinese: 晉景公十七年，病，卜大業之不遂者為祟。
sentences.literal: In Jin Jing Gong's seventeenth year, he fell ill. They divined that spirits were causing harm because great enterprises were not succeeding.

sentences.chinese: 韓厥稱趙成季之功，今後無祀，以感景公。
sentences.literal: Han Jue cited Zhao Cheng Ji's merits, saying that now his descendants had no sacrifices, to move Jing Gong.

sentences.chinese: 厥於是言趙武，而復與故趙氏田邑，續趙氏祀。
sentences.literal: Jue thus spoke of Zhao Wu, restored the former Zhao clan's fields and cities, and continued the Zhao clan sacrifices.
